channel.title: Hamachi problems
channel.description: Hamachi never works for me I log into Hamachi with username and pass, then enter ip into mopar client, choose a username and password, and click login. All I ever get with any server is "Error connecting to server. Must be down." drivin me nuts and nothin' I do works.... Any suggestions? Oh, and I never have any trouble with non-hamachi servers....

item.title: Hamachi problems
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

well you have to make sure that the host is on hamachi

the host will have the same ip on hamachi as the server ip that you put in moparscape

also, the host may not have the server running that that time

hope this helps =D

Read full topic
